text: Chen Wenli (born 4 May 1990) is a Chinese wheelchair basketball player. She is a member of the China women's national wheelchair basketball team. She won the silver medal at the 2020 Summer Paralympics, and the gold medal at the 2018 Asian Para Games. At the 2018 World Wheelchair Basketball Championship she finished fourth. == References == Category:1990 births Category:Chinese wheelchair basketball players Category:Living people Category:Paralympic silver medalists for China
title: Chen Wenli
